ohr_nachal_dead_st_pogo_nasel ohr_nachal_dead_st_pogo_nasel_done
I found your security guard. He's dead, he's lying in a tower near the village. 1
I knew it. He used to go there all the time, carrying stuff he'd bargained away from stalkers. Shotgun, detector. 2
What about payment? 3
You were there. I'm sure you've already taken that stuff for yourself. this will be your reward. ohr_nachal_dead_st_pogo_nasel_done
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog dolgmed_about_radwealech_done dolgmed_about_injector_has
You want something? 1
Uh. interested in a diagnostic kit? It's a thing that can diagnose your body for all sorts of diseases. Including radiation sickness levels. Interested? 2
Let's say. How much? 3
It's very rare. there's really very few of them around here. I won't give it to you for less than ten grand. Go for it. This thing also cures all diseases, I'm not kidding you. It's a novel development from a-- what's-his-name. Bloodcall. whatever. 4 5
nick.precond_desat_kasara I'll take it. dolgmed_about_injector_has nick.dolgmed_about_injector_done
Not this time.
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog nick.has_radweaknow jaba_about_radweaknow_done
Listen, uh. I don't feel so good. My health is failing, and it's hard to catch my breath. 1
It's like radiation sickness. There's medication for that too. 500 from you. dolgmed_about_radwealech_done 2 3
nick.precond_pisot_lech I'll take it. Here you go. nick.dolgmed_about_radwealech_otdaem
I won't do it now.
nick.has_radweaknow jaba_about_radweaknow_done
Listen. I don't feel so good. My health's failing, and it's hard to catch my breath. 1
Oh, radiation sickness. What can I say? I sent you the radiation memo, didn't I? Next time you won't have to deal with contaminated objects. 2
Can you help me? 3
I can. In fact, use your anti-radiation meds more often, alcohol helps too. Just don't take too long with the treatment. This disease has a lot of costs associated with it. jaba_about_radweaknow_done
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog nick.prec_art_mil_jaba mil_nap_to_pes_done mil_pes_art_done_has
Toad. 1
You have the artifact? 2
Yes. Stalker's dead. Take it. What about payment? 3
As agreed, my boy. A bargain is worth more than money. You've done me a great favor, my friend. Who knows, maybe I'll go back to the Cordon again. maybe I'll be able to pay you off. Go on. mil_pes_art_done_has nick.pes_art_otdaem
Listen carefully. 1
Hold on. 2
You have to kill the Dog. He fell off the bridge when the monsters attacked. He has the artifact. 3
... mil_nap_to_pes_done dialogs.break_dialog
Hello. I'm from Toad. 1
What's the plan? 2
There's a spike coming. there's a big pack of mutants coming from the Bright Ray. we have to be careful. Let's go to the base. The artifact must be there somewhere. 3
Let's go. mil_hap_talk_niva_done nick.mil_monsters_qutscene dialogs.break_dialog
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog bar_car_protect_prec bar_car_protect_has
I have a question for you. about keeping an eye on my car. 1
It's $2,000, and you can park it in the parking lot on the left when you get out of here. There's cameras there, no one's gonna mess with it. And if they do, Duty will sniper the fools. 6 6z
nick.dva_k_have Alright, I'm in. Here's the money. nick.dva_give_money bar_car_protect_has
I changed my mind.
Eh...? Where to? 1
Kravtsov sent me a message... 2
Ah..., you're the one from Cordon... Well, come in then. 3
... bar_dolh_ohr_stoper_talk_done
Fuck... 1
What are you doing? 2
Oh, you're that guy. twice-born! I'll tell you a secret, there's got to be a weapons stash under the floor somewhere. Dutyers hid it when we moved in. Toad said! So I thought I'd check it out. 3
... del_barpdalost_novice_talk_done

Listen, I've got a place to live. I've got a safe for my stuff, but I'm not sure it's big enough. Can you get me another one? The house is right here. 1
amet_dop_seif_raskaz 2 33
nick.precond_dopseif_bar Everything's there. Take the money and the artifacts. 3
nick.dopseif_bar_start bar_rem_dop_seif_done Okay, alright. I'll text you when I'm done.
Let's do it another time.
prof_sos_talk_done olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog bar_ohranik_zakurit_done
Why are you looking at me like that? 1
Hey, uh. Do you have a cigarette? I want to smoke. I'm fucked up. but I can't leave my post - Rat will notice and I'll get a reprimand... Help me out, will you? I'll give you a tip on a stash... I can't go myself, but I've got some information. 2 33
nick.precond_siga I got it. 3
nick.siga_daem_bar bar_ohranik_zakurit_done Oh, man. thanks, bro. Here you go. Why don't you go when you have time?
No, sorry.
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog olr_traders_night bar_barman_habar_door_open
Hey, can you open the locker? 1
I can do that. Two hundred and fifty bucks, I'll open it. I'm doing it without Rat's consent, so it's a little expensive, but it's your choice. 6 6z
nick.barman_dvestipisat_precond Alright, open it. Here's the money. bar_barman_habar_door_open nick.actor_barman_dvestipisat_banka
I changed my mind. dialogs.break_dialog
kill_band_turisty_done kill_all_bandgoups_done_talked olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
Job's done. I killed them all. 1
You're cool. I'll say. You're a real marksman, not like some of the others. The General's heard a lot about you. and they don't think you're a bad guy. considering what you've done. 2
What about payment? 3
No problem. It's partly from the faction and rumor has it from the General himself. You've been a great help to them. and I took my percentage, too, mind you. That's it. It's a pleasure doing business with you. nick.bandgroups_final_oplata kill_all_bandgoups_done_talked
sos_yan_nabaze osved_kill_band_groups_talked olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
What do you want? 1
Hello, uncle. I heard you made a big mess in the Dark Valley. Cool, cool, cool. Duty says you're an expert marksman... 2
What's your point? 3
What I heard. I'm looking for a man like you for a job. Interested? Vigilante work. 4
I suppose. What's the job? 5
The esteemed members of the Duty faction are currently working in the Dark Valley... I can't tell you what their interest is, but that's beside the point. They've come to me with a delicate request. I need to take someone down. Not just one. 6
Which one? 7
After what happened in the Valley, there's been a lot of gang activity in that area. and not just there. Duty doesn't like the way things are going. So they're looking for a man to hunt these elements. What do you say? 8
Let's say. 9
Okay. Now, from what I know, one of these groups is at the Rostok plant. They call themselves the Dark Priests. It's not much of a name, but whatever. You find them and you put them out. You got it? 10 12
Done. 11
That's it. When you're done, we'll contact you via PDA. osved_kill_band_groups_talked
Another time.
otpravlaet_spat_gg_done
Docent. 1
I think you'd better leave. Without the Professor, I don't think there's anything more for us to do here... 2
... dialogs.break_dialog
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
Ah, damn it. Medic, you? Come closer, I can't see you. 1
What's wrong with you? 2
Ah? The body is burning. we were in Bright Ray. on a mission. It looks like we've been infected with something. Shit, that hurts. 3
... dialogs.break_dialog
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
Who are you? 1
What are you doing here? 2
Why don't you get out of here. stay out of Duty's way and you'll live. 3
... dialogs.break_dialog
Hi... I think I heard something about you. 1
So? 2
Why'd you leave the bar? You used to be a repairman. 3
Rat. I didn't see eye to eye with him. All he had on his mind was making money, killing and selling everyone. that's why I left. See you later, I've got things to do.
You. 1
What are you looking at? 2
You insulted us. our entire clan. you will pay in blood. I challenge you to a duel, twice-born. 3
Why not? nick.grez_zaruba_gg dialog_grez_zaruba_gg_talked
radar_de_done dosent_kk_quest_start_talked
Hello... what do you want? 1
Friend. you've done a great job. Have you been to the central complex yet? 2
Which one? 3
Uh, right here on Yantar. Well, have you been? I can see that I have. Have you seen any of our lot, by any chance? The thing is, a chopper from the Big Land came here recently, and a batch of colleagues from one of the research institutes... 4
So... 5
They had with them an experimental prototype of protection against PSI. so these... heroes went to the center of the complex with it, saying it protects, everything was tested on the stands... They left, and there's no signal from them for 24 hours... Can you help me? 6 65
Find them? Let's try. 7
Not now.
You're helping! We may lose the rest of our funding because of this incident... you know. Go to the central complex and look for them there. dosent_kk_quest_start_talked
kkdead_chek_all dosent_kk_quest_done_talked
I found your guys. all dead, cause of death hard to pinpoint. probably just got lost in the dungeon and starved to death. 1
Shit. I knew it. Not many people come back from that dungeon. Why did they go down there? idiots. 2
Well, I kept my end of the bargain. 3
Yeah, yeah. here you go, thank you. You can't bring the boys back, it's from their allowance at the base. Here you go. They won't be needing it anymore. nick.dosent_kk_quest_don dosent_kk_quest_done_talked
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog greh_tanzor_leader_dead dialog_jaba_kill_greh_kk_tip_talked
Hey, what are you looking at? 1
What are you doing at the base with those psychos? I even came out of the bunker with my bad legs to hear the echo of the gunfire... What the fuck? 2
I think their story's over. 3
What, did you kill everyone in there? Uh, huh. I don't know, man. I don't know how this is gonna play out for you. and me, too. You know what? They don't die that easy. Nevertheless, take the prize for bravery, from me. The catacombs up in the hills. nick.jaba_kill_greh_kk_tip dialog_jaba_kill_greh_kk_tip_talked
Hi... You wanted something? 1
What are you doing here? 2
I'm doing. It's a place like this. they decided to send a scientific group here, so I joined the security for a pittance... What do you want?

morak_job_two morak_talk_two_talked
Hi... you paged me? 1
Paged, paged, paged. Ready for your next assignment? 2
That depends. 3
Alright, I'll get right to the point. Our patrol has noticed something strange coming from the Rostok factory grounds. We haven't gotten close to the fanatic base, but it's hiding near the railroad entrance. 4
What is it? 5
I can't tell you exactly what it is, but I think we should take it out. I don't want it showing up there again. 6
Can't you get a posse together and finish it off? 7
Look. You're the master of this kind of thing. You can do us a favor again. and we'll do you a favor in return. What do you think? Guys think you're a good guy after that chimera thing. 8
Alright, so where'd you say we saw the mutant? 9
Near the fanatic base, there's an entrance to the railroad underpass. That's where it's hanging out right now. You take her down, I'll never forget it. 10
Alright, it's a deal. morak_talk_two_talked
bar_asistent_talkshiet_done

Sorry, I'm busy now, let's talk next time. I have a lot of work to do. 2

morak_talk_two_talked_done
Hi... how's the trade? 1
Fuck off man, I don't really care about you right now. What did you want? Buy something? Come on, don't slow down, get the fuck outta here... I don't understand why they let people like you into the territory... 2
See you later. morak_talk_two_talked_done
Where to?! First talk to our merchant, he's on the third floor. Then we'll see if you can go to Chrom's place or not... 1
Alright. 2
Go on, get going.

There was a bloodsucker in the dungeon. You won't see him again. 1

... 3
See you around. I guess I'll see you around. nick.morak_talk_two_done morak_talk_two_done_talked

Is there any way to organize a food shipment now? I need canned goods. ten grand. 1
Right away? Uh, well. it's gonna cost a little more than one piece. How about this, 3 grand, and you get your food. okay? I'll just sell you all the supplies. it'll be a shortage for the people. 2 2434
nick.precond_tri_kasara Alright, here's the money. 3

morak_talk_one_talked
Hi... who are you? 1
Hello to you, too. Why? 2
Uh, no reason. just wondering. It's interesting to see people from Freedom here. 3
What's interesting about that? Our base is right next door, so we keep an eye on the neighboring territories. Dudes from Duty do the same thing, if you didn't know. 4
Yes, I did. What are you looking out for? 5
What business is it of yours? Although, uh. you ever heard of chimeras? 6
I have. 7
There's a rumor going around among the stalkers about a new monster. A two-headed beast. A very cunning and powerful creature that can get close to its prey in the blink of an eye. Several stalkers have already been killed by it. 8
Go on. 9
We don't like this arrangement, so why don't you take this thing down? It was last seen in the village. I'll give you a reward, believe me. 10
Alright, it's a deal. morak_talk_one_talked

olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog swp_first military_mechenyy_go
What's the matter? Why are you looking at me like that? 1
You got a problem, boy. I'm looking for you. Some stalker came to see me. a strange one, so to speak. 2 4
What makes you think they're looking for me? 3
Who else? Which one of us made so much noise, you could say turned the zone upside down? 4
Go on. 5

Alright. military_mechenyy_go

You want something? 1
Hey, Messer! Heard you were headed north. Aren't you scared? I mean, it's a mind-blower up there. 2
I shut down the rig at the lake. In theory, I could probably make it to the center. 3
Listen, if you do go deep into the zone, know that there's a lot of killer stalkers out there right now. I don't know where the hell they came from. Be careful. jaba_mill_helo_2_talked
jaba_mill_helo_talked
Hey, what are you doing here? Why'd you want to come all the way out here, where the radiation's all over the place? 1
mil_bodyguard_dialog_0 2
Well, you found the place. I mean, there's a lot of fanatics around here. They don't even say they're human. 3
mil_bodyguard_dialog_1 4
Maybe they like you. Who knows? 5
It's nothing like that. I'll tell you, they're no joke. I don't want to have to leave again. Away again. 6
How's the trade going now? Is business picking up? 7
Not so far. A lot of people don't know I'm here yet. 8
Well, don't dawdle. jaba_mill_helo_talked

I found something, uh. at the Rostok plant. Looks like a faulty psi-blocking device. Interested? I can give it to you for a price. 1
So, uh. Where did you find this? On Rostok? Let me take a look at it. Very interesting. This thing could help us with a case. I'll take it. I think it's enough for our deal. nick.psy_shapka_proto_rostok_otdaem
nick.has_biolab_start_money olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
I'm here for the money. the samples have been placed in your machine. 1
So... nick.money_obrazcy_give
yan_biolab_start_dialog_talked
Good afternoon...I don't think I've seen you here before. 1
How do you do? Yeah, you noticed right. We were transferred here on short notice from our research institute on the Big Land. We have a project. You're the stalker who's working with the scientists' camp, aren't you? We keep in touch with the Professor... 2
We used to. So what are you here for? 3
We're collecting bio-materials from the local fauna, so to speak. That's our specialty. If you have any of that stuff, we'd be happy to buy it for a reasonable fee. yan_biolab_start_dialog_talked
yan_biolab_start_dialog_talked yan_biolab_start_quest_talked olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog
I wouldn't mind selling some samples for your research... 1
Tell me. do you know how to drive? 2
Well, I used to... what's the point of this question? 3
Here's the deal. A cargo needs to be transported to Cordon, but I don't have a driver, or rather a reliable person for this kind of work. 4
What makes you think I fit your criteria? 5
Well, of course you do. you're the Messer that every dog knows about... And the Professor has a generally good opinion of you. So you'll help our cause? 6
Let's say so. 7
Then watch this. There's a truck in the village of Silent Hills. We need to move it to the Cordon, to the gate behind the factory. There used to be an old checkpoint there. If you do, we'll take your samples at a good price. Here, take the canister. nick.kanistra_savkin 8
I'll do it. yan_biolab_start_quest_talked
kamaz_priehal_kordon_savkin yan_biolab_start_quest_done_talked
I think it's done. 1
Greetings. yes, indeed, the shipment is here. I knew you wouldn't let me down. Uh, you were wondering about selling us some samples? 2
Yeah, that would be very helpful. 3
Great. The principle is, I don't need to sell anything, we have a tissue preservation machine in the next room. You put the samples in there, and I'll calculate their value here and give you the cash. Sounds simple. yan_biolab_start_quest_done_talked 4
Okay. Okay. 5
Uh, one more thing. In our research we use strong sources of radiation, so if you have such artifacts as various radioactive junk, I'll buy such samples for a good price. Here's the info on them. encyclopedy_zone_artifact_af-ameba-slime encyclopedy_zone_artifact_af-ameba-slug
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog yan_biolab_start_quest_done_talked
I think I have something for you. Radioactive artifacts. 1
Great, we need radioactive bolt artifacts, and radioactive shrapnel. For each of these artifacts, we're willing to give you a certain amount of money. 2 3 4
nick.precond_radbolt Here's the radioactive bolt, take it. nick.otdaem_radbolt
nick.precond_radoblomok There's a radioactive fragment, take it. nick.otdaem_radoblomok
There's nothing.
docent_zamer_vibros_daem docent_zamer_vibros_daem_st
Regarding the anti-mission device. 1
Yeah, it seems to be working. The recent blowout, we did another test... And it seems to be working. That's the sample I want to give you... 2
Thank you. 4
Just be warned, it has a life expectancy. I mean, you can't go blowout with it all the time, and sooner or later it will fail. But it should be good enough for a few times. Here, take it. nick.give_pribor_antivibros docent_zamer_vibros_daem_st
docent_zamer_vibros_st_pogo
Don't you have something for me? 1
There's this one thing. You see, we've developed a thing that, in theory, should help you survive a blowout... But the device requires measurements. We've discovered that there's a strange activity in the Zone during a blowout... 2
I can help with that. What do you need? 4
To find out the nature of the phenomena... You need to set up a device in the open, anywhere in the Zone during the emission... And after some time, pick it up and bring it back to us. In theory, it's simple. But in practice... nick.give_pribor_zamvibrosa docent_zamer_vibros_st_pogo
nick.prec_zamvibrosa zameritel_vibrosa_has_result docent_zamer_vibros_done_pogo
I think I've got a measurement. 1
You're alive! I'm glad you're not brain-dead. Do you have the device? 2
Yeah, take it. 4
Oh, great! You've done a good job, here's a little reward... I understand you could use a blowout device like this, but you'll have to wait... It's still a work in progress, but I'll let you know when I have the results. nick.done_zamvibrosa docent_zamer_vibros_done_pogo
nashel_dead_ohranika proff_ohrana_dead_done_pogo
I think I found your guard. 1
Yes? Where is he? What happened to him? 2
I found him in the village, dead. The military said they tried to shout him down, but he went out there, unresponsive. 4
Shit. that's weird. Maybe it's the effects of the installation that's in here, or-- Well done, stalker. I want to thank you for this little investigation. Here's a little present from me. nick.nagrada_milyan proff_ohrana_dead_done_pogo
start_quest_deadohrana proff_ohrana_dead_st_pogo
You were talking about a case. 1
Yes. I have a question. Have you noticed we have a stalker guard missing right now? It's not the first time something like this has happened. We're having a bit of a problem with them. Could you help us with that? 2
What do you suggest? 4
We should try to find him. Try talking to the military who are also guarding the bunker... I heard they didn't get along with him, maybe they had something to do with the disappearance... proff_ohrana_dead_st_pogo
proff_ohrana_dead_st_pogo ohr_nachal_dead_st_pogo
Do you know where the stalker who was guarding the bunker disappeared to? 1
What do you care? Maybe I do... but I don't know why I'd want to tell you... 2
He's missing, the Professor wants to know why. I know you guys haven't been very cooperative in your work, so... 4
Okay, okay, okay. Here's the deal. We don't care about him, your stalker. We don't give a shit about him. But if you want to know where he went, let's do it this way. Bring me and my boys five bottles of vodka, and you'll know where he's gone. 9 5
Alright, I'll get you some vodka. I will.
nick.prec_dolg_five_vodka Here you go, five bottles. 91
Here. That's a different conversation. Anyway, he went off somewhere in the direction of the village. We shouted at him, like where are you leaving your post, asshole, but he didn't pay any attention at all... So that's how it is... nick.vodka_otdal_milyan ohr_nachal_dead_st_pogo

What's your case? 1
We're receiving a signal from a group of zombies. Well, uh. they're not exactly zombies. Seems to be from up north. Not that it's a common occurrence, but still. We should take that chance. 2
What do you mean? 3
Well, we've developed a device that can detect if a stalker's been zombified or not. It hasn't been field-tested yet, and it's just arrived. material. 4
What do we need to do? 5
You need to use the device to see if any of them have been zombified. The zombified must be destroyed, and then the bodies must be scanned in detail with this device. Bring the data to me. I've got the coordinates. 6
Okay, I'm on it. docent_scan_zomb_start_inf nick.daem_detector_zomscan

Is there any way we can help you? 1

Let's say. 3

Find them, destroy them, take samples of the parasite, and then collect the personal records of those killed. You bring it all to me. Here's an air meter. I'll mark the location on the map. Will you do it? 6 61

I destroyed Phantasm. 1
It's unbelievable. Just a week ago, we were thinking of requesting a heavy-armed military unit for this case, and then you-- Well, we're grateful. 3
You can have your helmet back. 4
Yeah, give it to me. Heck, you even field-tested it. I can't leave you without a reward. Here, take this, it's the kind of thing that equips our important expeditions. It's yours now. 6
... 7
Oh, and one more thing. Since the swamp is relatively quiet now, one of our mobile teams has returned. If you need any equipment from the Big Land, you can talk to them. 8
I do have one question for you. 9
A question? What do you want to hear? 10
I'm about to head north to the radar. I've got documentation on the installation that's out there. The Winds of Madness. You've heard of them, right? 11
What? The Winds of Madness? Don't ask me that, I can't give you my notes on the cyclic vortexes, don't even ask! Sorry, I've got work to do! Have a good day! nick.otdaem_emulator_shapka actor_killed_phantasm_profesor_done

Well, maybe I can. 5
Absolutely, I'm sure you'll do just fine. So, after you've destroyed the creature in the zombie town, the path to the swamp is now open, and now you can get to Fantasmus. The techniques for fighting it are the same as in the city. 6

ratlab_strt ratlab_strt_talk_done
What about the lower levels of the dungeons? 1
I remembered something. A long time ago, when I was running around the zone like you, at the junkyard hauling metal... I used to see a group of scientists from time to time. They'd walk around, measure something, and then go off in the direction of the hangar. I'm guessing that's where they were going. 3
Go on. 4
So, uh. And they were hit by a blowout. I saw them myself, and I was saved by a miracle, maybe they're still lying there near a railroad tunnel in a valley at the Garbage. Maybe you'll find something on them that can open access to the lower levels. Go check it out. nick.ratlab_strt_onln ratlab_strt_talk_done
nick.has_ratlab_doki ratlab_strt_talk_done_talk_done
I managed to get into the lower levels of the dungeons. It's kind of like an abandoned lab. Here, I found some documents. 1
A lab? That's interesting. how many of them there are in the zone alone. Alright, let me see what's in here. 3
Well, uh. 4
Uh, it looks like there are notes that those tunnels have pathways to other areas. Only the PSI radiation is blocking some of them. It'd be nice to see how the diggers dig through the rubble. Okay, here's yours. nick.ratlab_strt_done ratlab_strt_talk_done_talk_done

What? Death Lamp? It's very rare. I'll take it. And if you say it has no negative properties... I won't begrudge you the money, that's for sure... 2 3
I'll take it. take it. nick.otdaem_smert_lamp_swamp

swamp_izlom_start_dialog_talked So you're saying you're the Journalist? 2
Yes, I am. We can come to the center of the zone. Together. you can't get in without me. There's just one thing you have to get. nick.izlom_talk_anim 3
What are you talking about? 4
The death lamp. I need it. It's the only way to get into the sarcophagus. It's here, on the edge of the cliff that leads to Pripyat. Lots of anomalies. I can't get through there. nick.izlom_talk_anim 5
Okay, I'll try. 6
If you would be so kind. bring me my artifact! nick.izlom_talk_anim 7
I will. swamp_izlom_start_dialog_talked

Alright. 6

Help me. 1 112 22

? One of the test subjects. there were two of us. the other one was taken to the lake. Help me. 3

I'll tell you everything. Just help me. I need your help. I can't assemble the necessary parts for a wagon that I can use to get around. You need to find them and bring them to me. 5

Hey, are you from the Professor? 1
Yeah, what's the plan? 3
Here's the plan. We need to be escorted to the entrance of the cordon. There used to be an old roadblock there, as far as I know. There's a helicopter waiting for us. cover us as much as you can, we're not really equipped. You ready? 4
Yeah, let's go. yan_tri_raidgruppa_talk_done
jaba_zaval_remove_start_talk_done nii_podval_zaval
I got a question for you. 1
Yes? What is it? 2
I need to clear some debris. I can't do it alone. Can you help me with that? 3
Wait, why would you do that? What's the rubble and where is it? 4 44
It's on the grounds of the MedPribor Research Institute. I can show you on a map. I need a few people to work on it. so you can help? 6
What's the difference? 6
Well. it's a bit of an unusual request. I can help, I guess. But, for your unusual request, I have an assignment for you, too. Unusual. 7
What is it? 9
I think you know very well that the military is off-limits here. It's already an unspoken rule for all stalkers. But there are exceptions. 10
Go on. 11
There's a soldier on patrol. very, so to speak, distinguished in the performance of his duties. He's been causing trouble for my humble business. You know what I'm talking about? 12 122
A little. 13
Military? I don't want to get involved with them yet. let's do it later.
Alright, then. So we need to do this quietly. So no one sees you at all. Otherwise you'll get in trouble with the military, and I don't want that. According to my intel, he's heading for the bridge area now. Get over there now, I'll contact you. jaba_zaval_remove_start_talk_done 14
Okay, I'm on my way.

Did you want something? 1
Yes... I don't know how much sense it makes right now with what's going on in the zone, but I think it would be important for you to know that... 2
Know what? 3
Those documents you gave the Professor. The information about the winds of madness... that was the final straw for him. 4
What about it? 5
What it said about what Woodpecker was guarding. It's out there somewhere, behind the power plant. It doesn't say exactly what it is, but the fact is. you know? 6
Maybe. 7
Look, everybody's headed for the center now. Maybe you can sneak in behind the power plant. 8
How do I do that? 9
It says you have to cut the power to the psi field defenses. According to the documentation, the defense controls are located in the bunker under the radar. We don't know where exactly, but there's some kind of code. 10
Why are you helping me? 11
The professor wanted the veil of secrecy lifted. I guess he did the same thing. nick.give_battery_charge final_swapm_naprav_talk_done

Hi. 1

? I don't know if it's me or not... 3

I was told you know something about Strelok. 5
About Strelok. Well, of course I do, like everybody else. I was lucky enough to meet him in person, though we never spoke. I went to Pripyat with his group. 6
Where is he now? 7
I have no idea. When we reached Pripyat, he and a small group went on to the power plant. It wasn't part of my plans. After that, he disappeared. He probably disappeared there, I'm telling you. It's a place like that. It doesn't matter. 8
What's in Pripyat? 9
Nothing much. Couple of monolithic zealots on the rooftops, but we put them down quick. I heard they're financed by some clan, and they're not really zombies, they just pretend to be. It's a lot of phonies out there, that's for sure. 10
You sure you don't know anything else about Strelok? 11

What do you mean? 2

How do you get those samples? 8
How do you get them? you take a knife in your hand and cut them. But you need the mutant information in the PDA to know which part of it is most valuable. Then take that shit to the scientists, maybe they'll give you some money for it. 9

You picked a good place. A good place to hide. Is the weather always like this here? 1
Hmm. don't you have anyone to talk to? Do something. And about the weather. there's a rumor that it's because of the lab. There's a PSI field on the lower levels that's affecting the terrain. 7
A PSI field? I've never heard of it. 8
You're better off not having heard of it. dolina_killer_pogoda_have
vorglaz_away_from_dolina vor_glaz_killers_garbage_have
Hey. 1
Stop! Don't move! It's a burner. If you don't move, it won't touch you. As long as there's not a stray gust of wind. I've seen what it does to people a couple times. It's probably what a chicken ham feels like in a microwave. 2
Shut up. It's kind of alert to our chatter. 3
I had a feeling it was waiting for us. 4
Nonsense, it's a phenomenon, it can't-- think. 5
And zombies are a phenomenon? 6
What do you mean? 7
Well, they don't seem to think, but some of them are after you for some reason. 8
So there must be someone behind them. Alright, enough of this talk, you can't stay in one place in the Zone for too long. Too bad the documents I got from the dwarves are gone. I guess I'll have to poke around their domain one more time. 9
Well, let's say not all of them. 10
What do you mean, not all of them? 11
vorglaz_gig_talk1 12
gfdgdgdfgdfgdjgh 13
No, but I still had a stash of food at our base. vor_glaz_killers_garbage_have nick.give_docks_vorglaz 14
Then we'll pick up the pace. You're a good handyman. What would I do without you?
cutcsene_dolg_killers_vorglaz vor_glaz_killers_go_have
Why did you come here? 1
I saw you tied up on the way out of the lab, and I saw you being dragged to the hangar. Boar was against it... but all the guys voted in favor. Here we are... A lot of people have certain expectations of you... 2
What's the point of this silly legend of the thrice-born? 3
The thrice-born can change the world. 4
But I'm only twice born, or even once, if you don't count natural birth. 5
I don't know, but people... 6
What's around the Zone? 7
jghkkkjhhh 8
But Watchdog said your purpose was to protect the outside world... 9
I thought that was, uh. just pretty words. Besides, he was an outsider himself. And we didn't care about the outside world. We thought it was just-- 10
Alright, we gotta get outta here. It's a wonder no one's eaten us yet. By the way, do the names Strelok and Journalist mean anything to you? 11
hfghfghgkkk 12
Was? 13
Probably. No one's seen him in a while. After he went north. 14
So twice-born isn't immune. 15
What?! 16
No, I was just talking about my own thing. What about the journalist?! 17
hgfjmasrte 18
Alright, let's go. vor_glaz_killers_go_have
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog escape_zbezali_from_killers dolina_killer_dolg_escape_done_brat_have
Are you okay? 1
Hi. Yeah, I'm fine. Thank you for your help. Here's a little help for all your hard work. Without you, I think we'd be screwed, that's for sure. 7
Take care. 8
Thanks again. Oh, uh. I think we're gonna kick those bastards' asses. nick.nagrada_escape_dolg dolina_killer_dolg_escape_done_brat_have
escape_zbezali_from_killers dolina_killer_dolg_escape_done_krav_have
I think we got it. How's your brother? 1
Hello, stalker. yeah, it worked out. My brother's fine, but he's been through a lot. He's a good shot, that's why those things kidnapped him. They're worthless themselves. 2
Any luck? 3
They're plotting an attack on our base and the roadblock. Rats is what they want to use. Hell knows how, but they've learned how to control them. That's why the bar is crawling with them. 4
What are you gonna do? 5
I think once we get our act together, we're gonna tear this goddamn base apart. It's about time we got rid of those bastards. 6
You don't know anything about the Dark Valley bandits? I heard they have data on the lab there. 7
Yeah, I think I heard of a group. They're supposed to be in the area right now. If you move now, there's a chance you can meet them on the east side of the area. 8
Alright, thanks. dolina_killer_dolg_escape_done_krav_have
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog killers_escape_brotha_start dolina_killer_dolg_escape_have
Who are you? 1
What do you want? Who the hell are you? 2
You know Kravtsov? 3
Kravtsov? Wait a minute... damn it, he must have found someone who can help! Listen, we gotta get out of here right now! There's very important information for the Duty group. It's about to be attacked. 4
Quiet. they might hear us. Do you know the way out of here? 5
Yes, but vaguely. I've been hit on the head, I can barely stand on my feet. 6 66
It's not time yet, we have to wait for the patrols to leave for the barracks.
olr_traders_night Now, we get out of here quietly and quietly and go to the old checkpoint. You know the way? 7
Yeah, just stay close. 8
Alright, then let's go. dolina_killer_dolg_escape_have
killed_killd_way_dead dolina_killer_two_done_have
The Renegade is dead. 1
You're a born killer. I can even see a worthy place for you in our clan. 2
You wanted to share information, didn't you? 3
I did. but not now. Later. Right now, we have an important matter to attend to, and you're not involved. 4
Why don't you enlighten me? 5
Why would I? We're very unhappy with Duty occupying the bar area and the passage to the dump. it's not good for business. 6
So? 7
We're not going to get them out of their positions on our own. But if we take it one step at a time and use the living forces of the zone... We've been working hard on that. Alright, enough chitchat. I'll call you when I need you. 8
So long. dolina_killer_two_done_have
kil_killrs_dead dolina_killer_done_have
Stalker's dead. 1
I had no doubt you were as bad a thug as my boys. 2
I hear there's a lab around here somewhere? You know anything about it? 3
A lab. My men don't go in there, but some of the local thugs and gangbangers used to go in there. Ask 'em. Wait a minute. we haven't settled our business with you yet. 4
What business? 5
We've got a doubting comrade here. He doesn't want to work. As you know, we can't just let a man who knows a lot go... 6
What do you need? 7
You know. He's here in the Valley, in a wagon next to the old construction site. There's also a former administration building next to it. Go ahead, stalker. 8
I will. dolina_killer_done_have
What do you want here? Nothing to eat, everything's been taken. 1
I have business. 2
What business? I'm telling you to get out of here while you're still alive. 3 99 88
So long, smart ass. dialogs.break_dialog

I'm sorry, then. dialogs.set_enemy_npc

Messer. Look, every member of the clan has their own agenda in the zone, just like I do. And I've got my sights set on you. I know you're an experienced marksman, you know how to hold a gun. 4
Get to the point. 5
Some stalker's been hunting a member of our group. We need to kill this stalker who's hiding in the MedPribor Research Institute... 6

Hi. What's that weird suit you're wearing? 1
Hello to you, too. Why do you want one of these? Hmm, well, if you'll be in one of our bases, for example on the lake Yantar or in the swamp, then talk to the bosses, maybe they'll take you as an employee. I've been stalking myself recently. 2
I'll keep you in mind. hello_dialog_iskatel_done nick.iskatel_level_talkerd

Where am I? where am I? 1
What? Who the hell are you? how did you get past the checkpoint? There's a hell of a lot going on over there right now. 2
I-I remember shutting down the installations. the brain link has been destroyed. I need to get out of the Zone now. I have vital information about what's going on behind the power plant. 3
Where? Wait a minute. have you been exposed to the installations up north? Are you zombified? Answer me! 4
I was behind the power plant. in the area of the generators. I managed to get inside the lab, they're there. they're behind everything that happens here. I need to leave the Zone. 5
Shit. you're not gonna get past the checkpoints and patrols in your condition... You know what? You better get out of here right now. I don't know you, so get out. 6

oso_question
oso_yes_0 dialogs.break_dialog nick.posthuman_ending
Uh-oh. where'd you come from? 1
I showed up, so I must have something to do. 2
Oh, okay. Hey, the lights came on and the gate opened. I've been down here as long as I've been down here, it's always dark and closed. There's a story that sometimes from behind the gate you hear strange noises, creaks, sighs, stomping... 3
So what are you doing here? 4
Toad sent me a signal to check it out. I've had a quick look around the neighborhood - a lot of rubble, but it will be possible to dismantle in time... It's not a commonly visited spot. I didn't go any farther. I'm scared. Why don't you go? 5
I'll go. dialog_ratcat_digger_talked
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog dialog_ratcat_digger_cheked dialog_ratcat_digger_jaba_done
I've been to the underground rooms under the dump. 1
Well. what is it? 2
I managed to open an entrance. But mostly all the passageways are blocked. 3
I know that... the guy you met and some others are already working on the debris... You haven't noticed anything else? 4
I saw a weird entrance. with cobwebs all over it. But it looks like there's a staircase to the lower levels of this communication. 5
Lower levels? That's interesting. I've heard of prisoners being held down there. A prison or something. Okay, we'll check it out. You keep in touch, see if there's a case to be made for all this. nick.clear_zavar_gar_rat dialog_ratcat_digger_jaba_done
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog ecagro_start_cheking_studen_resrch_done_zabr agr_studen_res_done
How's it going with your research? 1
Well, you're finally here. It's been a success. We seem to have modified the genetic structure of the bacteria in the sample you brought back, and we think it has an interesting property. 2
What is it? 3
We can't say for sure, but the artifact has acquired the ability to protect its host from the possibility of infection by parasite spores. I'm sure you've encountered such creatures before. 4
I have. 5
As a sign that you have delivered the sample and that the research has been successful, please take the artifact. From now on, I don't think you'll have any problems with parasites. But still, be careful. nick.daem_studenonem ecagro_start_cheking_studen_resrch_done_zabr
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog ecagro_start_cheking_studen_resrch_done ecagro_start_cheking_studen_done nick.precond_studenone
I have a jelly artifact for your research... 1
Oh, good. you've finally decided to donate it to us. Give it here, it might be a very profitable investment for you... 2
What are you going to do? 3
We have some research on the resistance of the bacteria inside the artifact to various viruses and parasites, but I'm not ready to talk about it yet... 4
When will you be ready? nick.otdaem_studenone2 ecagro_start_cheking_studen_resrch_done 5
After the research is complete we'll send you a message about the results, don't worry, stalker.
ecagro_start_cheking_studen_done ecagro_start_dialog_done
I wanted to ask you about this artifact called a jelly... There don't seem to be many of them in the zone, do there? 1
There aren't. Since we've been here, we've never been able to get a sample for research... But I think you might be able to help us with that. 2
And how would that be? 3
There is a way to locate such an artifact here in the zone. Don't ask how. We'll send you a message if the information checks out. 4
Okay, but what are the properties of this artifact? Is it safe? 5
If you donate the specimen you found to us for research, we can do a study of its unique properties... And in turn, share the discovery with you. Well, expect a message, stalker. ecagro_start_cheking_studen_done
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog ecagro_start_dialog_done
I think I have something for you. 1
Great, we need artifacts of jelly and cotton candy. For each of these artifacts, we're willing to give you a certain amount of money. 2 3 4
nick.precond_studenone Here's the jelly, take it. nick.otdaem_studenone
nick.precond_jguchipuh There's cotton candy, take it. nick.otdaem_jguchipuh
There's nothing.
ecagro_start_knopka_done
It doesn't seem very safe here. And you don't have much security-- How do you even plan on working here? 1
Have you been to an Yantar research power plant before? Maybe you've seen the security system that destroys mutants with a certain amount of force. We have that system. 2
Is that enough? 3
It is. The effect is only on the mutants, but we can use it. You can use it as well. The remote control is right here by the entrance. Note that the range is short and the device requires recharging. ecagro_start_knopka_done
ecagro_start_dialog_done
Are you the new science team? That's a pretty dangerous place to work. 1
Yes, that's right. It's not a bad place, considering there's a lot of material we need for our research. You probably know that this complex is covered with a lot of anomalous vegetation... 2
So you're studying the local flora? 3
You could say that. we specialize in jelly and cotton candy artifacts and plant anomalies. You're on the case, aren't you? encyclopedy_zone_artifact_af_studen ecagro_start_dialog_done
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog olr_agro_1_start agr_olr_1_pogo_koluchki
You alright? 1
Ah. Damn it, stalker. help me. I think I'm done. 2
I'll get the first aid kit. agr_olr_1_pogo_koluchki 3
Oh. It won't help me. A few barb artifacts should do the trick. Look around the factory. Ahh...
2 3 4 5
start_olr_mod escape_talk_goplit_done 21
Oooh... my head...
olr_agro_1_start escape_talk_goplit_done 31

Fucking blowout. That's not a good thing.
agr_olr_1_done 51
What a day today.
olr_pda.is_not_pda_dialog agr_olr_1_pogo_koluchki agr_olr_1_done
Hang in there, man. 1
Bloodsucker. didn't see it coming. while he was out while I was hunting for Flesh. he snuck up from behind. 2 33 3356
Hang on, I'll get the artifacts. dialogs.break_dialog
nick.goplit_2_have There's two black thorns, don't talk. Save your strength. I'm not gonna sit with you for long. You'll have the artifacts off in an hour. And you get another six hours of sleep and you'll be good as new. 43
I know, thanks. How much do I owe you? do I owe you? nick.goplit_2_otdaem 5
nick.goplit_5_have There's a lot of weak thorns, don't talk. Save your strength. I'm not gonna sit with you for long. In an hour, you'll be fine. Another six hours sleep and you'll be good as new. 4
I know, thanks. How much do I owe you? nick.goplit_5_otdaem 5
You don't owe me. 6
Altruists don't last long in the Zone. 7
I'm not altruistic. Maybe someday I'll find myself in a similar position. 8
They say you're-- 9
Bullshit. 10
agr_swamp_ratcatcher_talks_120 11
Bullshit! 99
Well, suit yourself. Oh, man, it hurts so bad. agr_olr_1_done olr_agro_2_start
